wishes.wish: Today I get to wish a very happy birthday🥳 to one of my recent friends! We may not have known each other for long but so far you have been a great friend.  So I hope you have an amazing birthday and many more great ones to come!💖 I wish you the very best on this special day Zesta.
Welcome to the 18+ club, @Apotre 🚫🥳. Here is to a less scary face and more cringe dancing, bruv 🍻😂  Cheers, mate! ⚽⚽ Here's to more mad adventures together! 🎉🕺
Happiest birthday🥳 sending you warm wishes on your special day😊 may you live more to witness God's abundant blessings in your life😇.Stay blessed and have an amazing life🥺🥴
